meanings.definition: A soft white Italian cheese made from buffalo or cow's milk.
meanings.sent1: I love to sprinkle mozzarella on top of my pasta dishes.
meanings.sent2: The mozzarella melted perfectly on the hot pizza.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous mouse snuck into the kitchen and stole the mozzarella from the fridge.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as soft and comforting as a fresh ball of mozzarella.
meanings.sent5: The mozzarella stretched like a rubber band when pulled apart.

meanings.definition: A dish made with mozzarella cheese, typically pizza or caprese salad.
meanings.sent1: My favorite meal is a classic margherita pizza with extra mozzarella.
meanings.sent2: The caprese salad was topped with slices of fresh mozzarella.
meanings.sent3: The mozzarella on the pizza was so gooey, it stuck to my chin when I took a bite.
meanings.sent4: The mozzarella in the salad was like little clouds of happiness on my plate.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of melted mozzarella filled the room, making everyone's mouths water.
